meta.name: Automate Real Estate Construction Site Discovery with 99acres Email Scraper

parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36

parameters.content: Triggers the workflow when a new email is received. Extracts subject and body to find user intent and location.
Cleans and formats scraped HTML data into structured project entries (e.g., project name, price, builder, etc.).
Sends back the matched construction projects to the email sender with a nicely formatted summary.
Formats all parsed projects into an email-friendly list (bullet points or table).
Scrapes construction project listings from 99acres or another property site based on extracted area and city.
Extracts area (e.g., gota, bopal) and city (e.g., Ahmedabad) from the email content. Falls back to city only if area is not mentioned.
